name: Defiance & Mr. Good Looking
storyline:
The Order of Heretics begins the hunt for the Cruel Angel, the Preacher of the Winds is the first target. The hunters assigned to the mission are:
Defiance: A swordsman new to the Order. He uses a Ximira sword that is versatile and agile, although he handles it well, he still doesn't master more advanced attack techniques that require the use of the sheath.
Mr. Good Looking: Experienced hunter with a somewhat mysterious past, few know his real name. He is a skilled gunslinger capable of both using various firearms as well as creating them, his weapon of choice is the Magun, an unconventional rifle that he rarely uses with full force.
summary: Defiance and Mr. Good Looking is a fast-paced single player FPS where you play as two characters (a Gunslinger and a Swordsman), switching between them to manage health and ammo.
